content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Newcomers' Badge\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":16465,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4d6c2783-7a0f-4835-91d8-e244d17ab443/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/4d6c2783-7a0f-4835-91d8-e244d17ab443/Capture.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"4d6c2783-7a0f-4835-91d8-e244d17ab443\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":239,\"height\":232},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"FYI:\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Fortnite Llamas, also known as Llama Pinatas, are the main \\\"loot boxes\\\" in Fortnite. They are also Fortnite's primary mascot.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dnc0-noulQk\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Epic Games Llama\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" has been recognized around the world for some time. You can find a lot of Fortnite Llama references on the Internet: someone sews Fortnite Llamas and sells them all over the world, someone teaches how to draw the Llama or how to create Llama cupcakes, and so on.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Two years ago, as part of the Fortnite season 5 marketing campaign, Epic took Fortnite to the real world. People all around the globe found a teaser in the form of a friendly Llama from Fortnite. It was spotted in several cities (according to some sources – in seven): one each in Paris, Cologne, Cannes, Warsaw, Barcelona, and two in London. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every Fortnite player knows that when you find a Supply Llama in Fortnite Battle Royale, you open it and get a bunch of goodies. So, people started to wonder what’s inside the real ones… \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"From the very start, we provide our Newcomers with a supply of experience, support, and account culture knowledge base. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Let's have a great journey!\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":76148,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9526fdc3-ec1e-4dd0-b6e9-d38168f4cb72/Capture1.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9526fdc3-ec1e-4dd0-b6e9-d38168f4cb72/Capture1.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Capture1.JPG\",\"name\":\"Capture1.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9526fdc3-ec1e-4dd0-b6e9-d38168f4cb72\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":523,\"height\":646},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Welcome Letter \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When you first join a new project, you will receive an onboarding email that will contain all the necessary information you need to get started, such as useful links and contacts. Make sure to read the email carefully and ask any questions you may have. The onboarding email is your first point of contact with the team, listed there people will be your first advisors. It's important to make a good impression by showing that you're engaged and eager to learn.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Survey\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As part of the onboarding process, you will also be asked to complete a survey about yourself. This survey is designed to give the team a better understanding of your background, skills, and interests. It is an opportunity for you to introduce yourself to the team and to let them know what you bring to the table. We do not recommend skipping it as it is a good chance for you to learn more about your new colleagues and what they're working on.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The Greetings\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#669900\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Once you've completed the survey, your responses will be shared with the team. This is a great opportunity for your new colleagues to get to know you and to welcome you to the team. They may reach out to you individually or through a group chat to introduce themselves and offer any assistance you may need. Make sure to respond to any greetings you receive and to express your appreciation for the warm welcome. This will help you to build positive relationships with your colleagues and to feel more comfortable as you begin to work together.\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
